ComicInfo.Title: When a Stranger Comes to Call
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:17:24. [CVDB99030] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:31:22. [Issue ID 217280]
ComicInfo.Characters: Elizabeth Lane [Avalon],James Holmes,Gwyna Lane (Liz's grandmother),Tachyon (blue alien),Nancy Dreiser,Dan Barkins [Impulse],Cliff Pasternak
ComicInfo.Summary: When a Stranger Comes to Call: Tachyon sits on the moon pondering his new surroundings. Liz and Dan are captured by the Corporation.
